com.nextpeer.android

Class NextpeerSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nextpeer.android.NextpeerSettings

  • public final class NextpeerSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines settings for the Nextpeer platform.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayAlignment
      Defines the alignment of the in-game ranking display.
      static class  NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayPosition
      Defines where the in-game ranking display notifications can appear on the screen.
      static class  NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayStyle
      Defines the possible styles for the in-game ranking display.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayAlignment inGameNotificationAlignment
      How the notification should be aligned during the tournament (on the GameScene).
      NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayPosition inGameNotificationPosition
      Where Nextpeer should place the in-game notification during the tournament (on the GameScene).
      NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayStyle inGameNotificationStyle
      Which notification style Nextpeer should use the in-game notification during the tournament (on the GameScene).
      boolean shouldShowStatusBar
      Whether or not to display the status bar on-top of Nextpeer's screen.

    • Field Detail

      • inGameNotificationPosition

        public NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayPosition inGameNotificationPosition
        Where Nextpeer should place the in-game notification during the tournament (on the GameScene). Default NextpeerRankingDisplayPosition.TOP.

      • inGameNotificationStyle

        public NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayStyle inGameNotificationStyle
        Which notification style Nextpeer should use the in-game notification during the tournament (on the GameScene). Default NextpeerRankingDisplayStyle.LIST.

      • inGameNotificationAlignment

        public NextpeerSettings.NextpeerRankingDisplayAlignment inGameNotificationAlignment
        How the notification should be aligned during the tournament (on the GameScene). Default NextpeerRankingDisplayAlignment.HORIZONTAL.

      • shouldShowStatusBar

        public boolean shouldShowStatusBar
        Whether or not to display the status bar on-top of Nextpeer's screen. Default false.

      • NextpeerSettings

        public NextpeerSettings()
